questions.label: Date to return to first PNC visit
Latest delivery - Infant 1 - Name
questions.questionInfo: In case of twins and only 1 present at consultation, Infant 1 refers to the one present. If more than 2 twins, after completing this form open another form and fill only information about the children missed.

questions.label: Latest delivery - Problems - If other, specify
Any of selected items should also be added in "Conditions"
Check in "Vital & Biometrics" and fill with updated measurements for "Blood pressure", "Temperature" and "MUAC"
PHQ-2 - Over the last two weeks, how often have you had little interest or pleasure in doing things?

answers.label: More than half the days (2 points)

questions.label: PHQ-2 - Over the last two weeks, how often have you been feeling down, depressed, or hopeless?

answers.label: More than half the days (2 points)

questions.label: Scoring
value: Scoring:(in"i":"Sum of all points from answers above") (answer is automatic sum of points from the 2 previous questions- when 3 or more points, automatic answer includes "Please refer to Psychosocial counselling follow up)
questions.questionInfo: Sum of all points from answers above

questions.label: Check in "Results Viewer" for latest laboratory test results

answers.label: Danger signs for mother and infant
Resumption of menses and sexual activity
Post partum infection after vaginal delivery

questions.label: Is there a follow up visit planned?
Set the next consultation date in "Appointments"
Prescribe new exams and medication with the order basket if necessary (after closing this form)
